name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James WILSON, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James WILSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Paul Mark Perlstein, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Division, Asst. Dist. Atty., Franklin L. Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 128
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James WILSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 22, 1980.
Decided May 16, 1980.
Paul Mark Perlstein, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Division, Asst. Dist. Atty., Franklin L. Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
